data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Elsam, Juana De Egea, Pena-Chocarro, Maria del Carmen, Mereles, Fatima, Cespedes, Gloria (2018): Manihottakape sp. nov. (Euphorbiaceae), a new tuberous subshrub from the Paraguayan Chaco. PhytoKeys 103: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.103.26307, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.103.26307
